# asBoolean() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Utility function for custom functions. Cast a value as a Boolean, unwrapping objects using their `valueOf()` methods. Also accepts `'true'` and `'false'`<!-- -->. Throws a `RangeError` for invalid inputs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function asBoolean(value: unknown): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown |  |

**Returns:**

boolean
